message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is there any flexibility on your end?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $10500. This is a compromise that still benefits both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $9000. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $9500. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $10200. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $9800, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is there any room for further negotiation?

I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $10000. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $9500. I'd like to make one last offer of $9500. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'd be happy to move forward with the purchase.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I can offer the product to you for $9800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but I'd like to make one final offer. If you're willing to sell it to me for $9500, I'll make the purchase. If not, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $12000.
